Package client.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddOccasionalController
    this class handles adding a random visitor, search for place availability, enters visitor and updates in data base, calculates price based on visitor type
    AddVisitorController
    add visitor class, handles search order ID and letting visitors with orders enter the park
    CardReaderEntranceController
    this class handles visitors entering park using card reader scan card and enter
    CardReaderExitController
    this class handles visitors existing using card reader, uses scan card and click exit
    CardReaderMainMenuController
    this class handles the card reader main menu choosing exit or entry pages
    ConfirmDiscount
    this class represents the confirmation of a discount
    ConfirmParametersController
    this class represents the confirmation of a parameter (max visitors, max orders, visiting time)
    CreateOrderController
    This Class is for CreateOrderController, the class contains methods for: switching scenes, making order, entering waitinglist, showing other dates and time in case the order time is not available
    CreateSubController
    create subscriber controller, handles creating a subscriber by service worker.
    DepartmentManagerManuController
    this class represents the Park Department Menu: Department manager can choose: confirm Parameters/Create Reports/confirm Discount
    DepReportCanncellationController
    this class represents the canncellation report for that the department manager creates
    DepReportController
    this class represents the menu of reports for department manager
    DepReportStayingController
    this class represents the Staying report for that the department manager creates
    DepReportVisitingController
    this class represents the Visiting report for that the department manager creates
    EntranceController
    entrance controller class.
    ExitVisitController
    This class is the controller of exit visit Screen - it contains methods for handling searching and checking for a visit id, and existing a visitor from the park, updating park visitors amount and the visit information in database.
    loginPageController
    This class responsible to all function of login page.
    MenuNewVisitorController
    This Class is for MenuNewVisitorController The class contains methods for the menu Navigation + initialize the clock
    MenuVisitorWithOrderController
    This Class is for MenuVisitorWithOrderController The class contains methods for the menu Navigation + initialize the clock
    ParkManagerManuController
    this class is represents the Park Manager Menu: park manager can choose: Update Parameters/Create Reports/Update Discount
    ParkReportController
    This class is represents the Park Report Controller that allows to choose which report create: Usage Report/Income Report/Visitors Report
    ParkReportIncomeController
    This class is represents an income report of the park. after getting two dates: "From" and "To" the income that summed up is: of the park that the worker is belongs to and between the dates: "From" and "To"
    ParkReportUsageController
    This class is represent a Park Usage Report it shows in the table in the given date the percentage of the use of the specific park (from maximum that allowed on this date).
    ParkReportVisitorsController
    This class is represents the sum of the 3 type of the visitors in the park between the dates: "From" and "To"
    ScreenController
    this class responsible for settings of scenes also uses switchscenes method to change between different scenes
    UpdateDiscountController
    This class is represents the Discounts update, park manager can choose to enter between the dates: "From" and "To" and send to Department manager for confermation and create txt file of the report.
    updateParametersController
    This class is represent the update parameters of the given park by choose new MaxVisitors/MaxOrders/VisitingTime parameters and send them for confirmation to Department Manager
    ViewMyOrdersController
    This class is the controller of View My Orders Screen - the controller loads the orders of the Traveler into the tableview , A request is being sent to the server for the realvent data
    ViewOrderDetailsController
    This class is the controller of View Order Details Screen - it contains methods for handling order - Cancel order , confirm arrivel , confirm order from waiting list , paynow button for guide .
    WorkerEntranceMenuController
    This class is the controller of Worker Entrance Menu Screen.
    WorkerServiceMenuController
    This class is the controller of Worker Service Menu Screen.
